history.title: Institute History
history.intro1: By the <1>Decree of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan No. PQ-5261 dated October 16, 2021</1>, the Batyr Zakirov National Institute of Pop Art was established under the State Conservatory of Uzbekistan.
history.intro2: At the opening ceremony of the Batyr Zakirov National Institute of Pop Art, the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan Shavkat Mirziyoyev said the following about the pop singer Batyr Zakirov:
history.quote: “Fate entrusted Batyr Zakirov with the glorious task of becoming the founder of Uzbek pop art, and he fulfilled this task with honor. <1/> Thanks to the unique talent and human qualities bestowed upon him by Allah, Batyr Zakirov created true miracles in the art world.”
history.president_signature: President of the Republic of Uzbekistan Shavkat Mirziyoyev
history.image_caption: President of the Republic of Uzbekistan Shavkat Mirziyoyev at the opening ceremony of the Botir Zakirov monument

0.title: Uzbek Pop Music
0.description: Uzbek pop music has a rich 100-year history. It should be noted that the early forms of this art, unlike modern perceptions, demonstrated superficial forms of pop. The pop works that modern audiences see and hear on stage today are the result of the influence of culture from different eras, changes in political and social realities, as well as years of hard work and research by talented individuals.

1.title: Department of Pop Performance at the Tashkent State Conservatory
1.description: Initially, the Department of Pop Performance began its activities at the Mukhtar Ashrafi Tashkent State Conservatory. Thus, starting from 1997, for the first time in Uzbekistan, the teaching of the history of pop music art was established in the higher education system.

2.title: “Pop Art” Faculty within the State Conservatory of Uzbekistan
2.description: In 2002, in connection with granting the Tashkent State Conservatory the status of the State Conservatory of Uzbekistan and the commissioning of a new building, the “Pop Art” faculty was introduced into the structure, operating until 2021.

3.title: Decree of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan
3.description: On the basis of the “Pop Art” faculty, by the Decree of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan No. PQ-5261 dated October 16, 2021, the Batyr Zakirov National Institute of Pop Art was established under the State Conservatory of Uzbekistan.

4.title: Undergraduate and Graduate Directions of the Institute Determined
4.description: In 2022-2023, a number of new specialties and directions for bachelors and masters were approved. Currently, the Batyr Zakirov National Institute of Pop Art trains highly qualified specialists in the directions of: pop singing, pop instrumental performance, composition, musicology, pop orchestra conducting, musical sound engineering, and training of pop performance teachers.

footer.desc: Our main goal is the development of Uzbekistan's national pop art, discovering young talents and raising them to a professional level.

bio.p1: [TRANSLATION_MISSING] 1936 yilda Alisher Navoiy nomidagi opera va balet teatri artisti Karim Zokirov va Muqumiy nomidagi musiqali drama teatri qo'shiqchisi Shoista Saidovalar xonadonida o'g'il farzand dunyoga keladi. To'ng'ich farzandlariga yaxshi niyatlar bilan Botir deb ism qo'yishadi.
bio.p2: [TRANSLATION_MISSING] Zokirovlar xonadoniga ko'plab san'at ahli namoyondalari tashrif buyurgani sababli Botirning ko'nglida ham musiqaga nisbatan kuchli muxabbat paydo bo'la boshlaydi. U 1952-1957 yillarda Toshkent Davlat konservatoriyasida, 1958- 1962 yillarda esa Toshkent Davlat teatr va rassomchilik institutlarida tahsil oladi. U “Yoshlik” ansambli va O’zbek Davlat estrada orkestrining yakkaxon xonandasi sifatida faoliyat olib borgan.
bio.p3: [TRANSLATION_MISSING] U 29 yoshida O’zbekiston xalq artisti unvoniga sazovor bo’lgan.
bio.p4: [TRANSLATION_MISSING] Botir Zokirov 1955-yilda og'ir dardga yo'liqqan. Bir necha marta jarrohlik amaliyotlarini boshidan o'tkazgan. Shifokorlar unga qo'shiq aytishni taqiqlagan. Lekin u ijoddan to'xtamagan.
bio.p5: [TRANSLATION_MISSING] U sharq folklori va zamonaviy estrada san'atini uyg'unlashtirib, “Myuzik xoll” ijodiy jamoasini tashkil etgan, xonanda va kompozitor sifatida ko'plab yoshlarga ustozlik qilgan. Respublikada xizmat ko'rsatgan “Yalla” ansamblining tashkil topishida uning xizmatlari katta bo'lgan.
bio.p6: [TRANSLATION_MISSING] San'atkorning xotirasini e'zozlash maqsadida 2021-yilda Botir Zokirovning 85 yillik tavallud ayyomi keng nishonlangan. Uning nomidagi milliy mukofot ta'sis etildi. U haqda ilmiy va badiiy asarlar, hujjatli film va spektakllar yaratildi.
bio.p7: [TRANSLATION_MISSING] Botir Zokirov tahsil olgan O’zbekiston davlat konservatoriyasi joylashgan ko'chaga uning nomi berildi. Ushbu konservatoriya huzurida Botir Zokirov nomidagi milliy estrada san’ati instituti barpo etildi.
bio.p8: [TRANSLATION_MISSING] 2000-yilda “Buyuk xizmatlari uchun” va 2021-yilda “El-yurt hurmati” ordenlari bilan mukofotlangan. 1985- yilda — 49 yoshida vafot etgan.

quote.text:
[TRANSLATION_MISSING] "Sehrli musiqani tinglab o'zingni yettinchi osmonda his etasan. Alamu og'riqlardan nishon yo'q, faqat ohanglar, ohanglar... Ohanglar erkin qush misol seni yuksaklarga eltadi. Ko'nglingdagi barcha g'uborlar yuvilib ketgan. Ko'zlaringdan sizayotgan yoshni sezasan...

Bu dunyoda boshqa hech narsa yo'q! Bari ro'yo! Faqat, faqat musiqa qoldi. ...Yo'tal ohangga aralashib ketdi. Hechqisi yo'q. Axir, musiqa yangrayapti! Borliq qanchalar go'zal..."
quote.author: [TRANSLATION_MISSING] Botir Zokirov
